function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of health data fluidity exposes vulnerability to pandemics like COVID-19.","Impact":"Inability to quickly and securely share health information across regions during pandemics.","Mitigation":"Implementation of a blockchain-based framework for user-centric access to medical data, including wearable devices and IoT.","Technologies":"Blockchain, P2P file storage, cryptographic techniques, Ethereum, smart contracts, IPFS, IoT, openpgp","People":"Patients, healthcare providers, public health authorities","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, government health departments, technology companies"},{"Description":"Insecure storage of sensitive medical data on distributed P2P file storage system.","Impact":"Risk of unauthorized access and exposure of sensitive medical data.","Mitigation":"Use of cryptographic techniques and blockchain-based framework for secure and user-centric access to medical data.","Technologies":"Cryptographic techniques, blockchain, P2P file storage, Ethereum, smart contracts, IPFS","People":"Patients, healthcare providers","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, technology companies"},{"Description":"Use of openpgp for generating and managing PGP keys for patients' medical data.","Impact":"Risk of unauthorized access to patients' medical data if PGP keys are compromised.","Mitigation":"Ensuring strong security measures for PGP key generation and management, including secure storage and access control.","Technologies":"openpgp, PGP, encryption, access control","People":"Patients, healthcare providers","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, technology companies"}]}
